basics.name: Cory Schimmoeller
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Passionate software developer with experience building enterprise applications using JavaScript and React. I wish to utilize my experience and dedication to solve difficult problems and create unique software solutions.

highlights: Used modern web development tools to create, deploy, and maintain 4 enterprise applications over the past three years.
Built more than 50 React components for consumption internally and externally.
Participated in and contributed to Joint Application Design sessions.
Refactored existing applications from vanilla JavaScript to React for improved performance and easier maintainability.
Used Test Driven Development techniques to produce reliable-working software early and often.
Operated as a full-stack developer by using Node.js to develop a websocket proxy for our internal APIs.
Engaged in daily Agile standup meetings.
Created integrated test suites for three of our released applications using Spectron.
Made the dean's list in Spring and Fall of 2018
